mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(T_TMP.F_DATE, '%c月%e日') AS R_DATE_UNIT, IFNULL(SUM(T_INVEN.quantity), 0) AS R_SUM_QUANTITY FROM ( SELECT @cdate := DATE_SUB(@cdate, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS F_DATE FROM (SELECT @cdate := DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM app_inventory_record) T_TMP2 LIMIT 30 ) T_TMP LEFT JOIN app_inventory_record T_INVEN ON DATE(T_TMP.F_DATE) = DATE(T_INVEN.gmt_created) AND T_INVEN.TYPE = '3' GROUP BY T_TMP.F_DATE ORDER BY T_TMP.F_DATE ASC;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(T_TMP.F_DATE, '%c月') AS R_DATE_UNIT, IFNULL(SUM(T_INVEN.quantity), 0) AS R_SUM_QUANTITY FROM ( SELECT @cdate := DATE_SUB(@cdate, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AS F_DATE FROM (SELECT @cdate := DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) FROM app_inventory_record) T_TMP2 WHERE YEAR(@cdate) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) LIMIT 12 ) T_TMP LEFT JOIN app_inventory_record T_INVEN ON YEAR(T_TMP.F_DATE) = YEAR(T_INVEN.gmt_created) AND MONTH(T_TMP.F_DATE) = MONTH(T_INVEN.gmt_created) AND T_INVEN.TYPE = '3' WHERE YEAR(T_TMP.F_DATE) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY T_TMP.F_DATE ORDER BY T_TMP.F_DATE ASC;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(T_TMP.F_DATE, '%Y年') AS R_DATE_UNIT, IFNULL(SUM(T_INVEN.quantity), 0) AS R_SUM_QUANTITY FROM ( SELECT @cdate := DATE_SUB(@cdate, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AS F_DATE FROM (SELECT @cdate := DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) FROM app_inventory_record) T_TMP2 LIMIT 5 ) T_TMP LEFT JOIN app_inventory_record T_INVEN ON YEAR(T_TMP.F_DATE) = YEAR(T_INVEN.gmt_created) AND T_INVEN.TYPE = '3' GROUP BY T_TMP.F_DATE ORDER BY T_TMP.F_DATE ASC;
